theme-image-path.description: Use a path relative to the location of the final compiled CSS.

theme-show-compile-warnings.description: Show Sass warnings when functions and mixins use non-standard tokens.

theme-show-notifications.description: Show updates and notifications about the design system.

theme-namespace.description: Set a namespace for grid and utility classes.

theme-prefix-separator.description: Set the character that separates responsive and state prefixes from the main class name. The default (“:”) is preceded by two backslashes so that it is properly escaped.

theme-global-border-box-sizing.description: When set to true, sets the box-sizing property of all site elements to border-box.

theme-focus-color.description: The color of the focus outline.

theme-focus-offset.description: The offset between the element and the focus outline.

theme-focus-style.description: The style of the focus outline.

theme-focus-width.description: The width of the focus outline.

theme-icon-image-size.description: The size of a standard UI icon (like a close box).

test-system-color-tokens.description: Test system color tokens against luminosity bounds. This is intended to be an internal setting, and may result in false positives.

theme-color-primary-family.description: Color family of ~60% of the non-base color.

theme-color-secondary-family.description: Color family of ~30% of the non-base color.

theme-color-accent-warm-family.description: Color family of occasional warm accents.

theme-color-accent-cool-family.description: Color family of occasional cool accents.

theme-body-background-color.description: Background color of the site body.

theme-text-reverse-color.description: Color of body text on dark backgrounds.

theme-link-reverse-color.description: Color for text links on dark backgrounds.

theme-link-reverse-hover-color.description: Color for :hover text links on dark backgrounds.

theme-link-reverse-active-color.description: Color for :active text links on dark backgrounds.

theme-accordion-border-width.description: Border width of the bordered accordion.

theme-accordion-border-color.description: Border color of the bordered accordion.

theme-alert-bar-width.description: Width of the colored bar to the left of the alert.

theme-alert-padding-x.description: Padding on the left and right of the alert.

theme-alert-padding-y.description: Padding on the top and bottom of the alert.

theme-alert-text-color.description: Text color on light backgrounds. Default uses text color set in $theme-text-color

theme-alert-link-color.description: Link color on light backgrounds. Default uses text color set in $theme-text-color

theme-alert-text-reverse-color.description: Text color on dark backgrounds. Default uses reverse text color set in $theme-text-reverse-color.

theme-alert-link-reverse-color.description: Link color on dark backgrounds. Default uses reverse link color set in $theme-link-reverse-color.

theme-banner-background-color.description: Background color of the banner and its content.

theme-banner-font-family.description: The font family of the banner.

theme-banner-link-color.description: The color of banner link. Add the link color and the system will generate the hover state. Default uses the default link settings calculated from your background color.

theme-banner-max-width.description: Maximum width of the banner content.

theme-breadcrumb-background-color.description: The background color of the complete breadcrumb bar. Default uses body background color set in $theme-body-background-color.

theme-breadcrumb-font-family.description: The family of the breadcrumb text.

theme-breadcrumb-font-size.description: The size of the breadcrumb text.

theme-breadcrumb-link-color.description: The color of breadcrumb link. Add the link color and the system will generate the hover state. Default uses the default link settings calculated from your background color.

theme-breadcrumb-min-width.description: The width at which the breadcrumb displays the full breadcrumb list.

theme-breadcrumb-padding-x.description: Padding to the right and left of the breadcrumb.

theme-breadcrumb-separator-color.description: Color of the breadcrumb separator. This value needs AA contrast against the background.

theme-button-border-radius.description: Button border radius for rounded corners.

theme-button-small-width.description: Width of small buttons. Used to define the size of the header search button and small language selector button.

theme-button-stroke-width.description: Stroke width of outline button variants.

theme-card-gap.description: Gap between cards in a card group.

theme-card-flag-min-width.description: Width at which flag cards change to horizontal layout.

theme-card-flag-image-width.description: Fixed image width in the card flag variant.

theme-card-header-typeset.description: Family, size, and line height of the heading.

theme-card-padding-perimeter.description: Padding between card elements and card border.

theme-checkbox-border-radius.description: Checkbox border radius for rounded corners.

theme-input-background-color.description: Background color for radio and checkbox inputs.

theme-input-tile-border-radius.description: Tile border radius for rounded corners.

theme-collection-header-typeset.description: Family, size, and line height of the heading.

theme-header-logo-text-width.description: Width of the logo text area at desktop width as a percentage of the total header width.

theme-header-min-width.description: Breakpoint at which the non-mobile header is shown.

theme-hero-image.description: Background image for the hero. Use a path relative to the final project CSS.

theme-icon-list-font-family.description: Font family of the content text.

theme-icon-list-title-font-family.description: Font family of the content title.

theme-identifier-background-color.description: The background color of the identifier. Use a color of grade 80 or higher, darker than the section that precedes it.

theme-identifier-font-family.description: The font family of the identifier.

theme-identifier-identity-domain-color.description: The color of your domain text in the identifier masthead. This should be grade 20-30 in the same family as the $theme-identifier-background-color.

theme-identifier-max-width.description: The maximum width of the content within the identifier. Use the same max-width as your site footer.

theme-identifier-primary-link-color.description: The color of the links in the masthead section. Default uses either the standard or reverse link color set with $theme-link-color and $theme-link-reverse-color.

theme-identifier-secondary-link-color.description: The color of the links in the required links section. This should be grade 20-30 in a gray family.

theme-in-page-nav-background-color.description: Background color of the in-page navigation block. Default uses body background color set in $theme-body-background-color.

theme-in-page-nav-background-padding.description: Padding of the in-page navigation block.

theme-in-page-nav-background-radius.description: The border radius of the in-page navigation block.

theme-in-page-nav-bar-color.description: Color of the bar representing the active state of a link in the in-page navigation. Default uses the default link settings calculated from your background color.

theme-in-page-nav-bar-width.description: Width of the colored bar representing the active state of a link in the in-page navigation.

theme-in-page-nav-font-family.description: Font family of the in-page navigation.

theme-in-page-nav-link-color.description: The color of the link in the in-page navigation. Default uses the default link settings calculated from your background color.

theme-in-page-nav-main-content-max-width.description: Maximum width of the main element.

theme-in-page-nav-margin-left.description: Margin to the left of in-page navigation.

theme-in-page-nav-top.description: Distance from top of page to top of navigation when the sticky position is engaged on scroll.

theme-input-max-width.description: Max width of the input element.

theme-input-select-border-width.description: Border width of selection element for checkbox, radio, and range.

theme-input-select-size.description: Height and width checkboxes and radio buttons.

theme-input-state-border-width.description: Border width of special state inputs (like error state).

theme-modal-border-radius.description: The border radius of the modal window.

theme-modal-default-max-width.description: Maximum width of large modal window.

theme-modal-lg-content-max-width.description: Maximum width of content area within large modal window.

theme-megamenu-columns.description: Number of columns in the megamenu.

theme-pagination-background-color.description: The background color of the entire pagination component.

theme-pagination-breakpoint.description: Breakpoint at which full pagination displays.

theme-process-list-counter-background-co.description: Background color of the counter circle.

theme-process-list-counter-border-color.description: Color of the border around the counter circle.

theme-process-list-counter-border-width.description: Size of the border around the counter circle.

theme-process-list-counter-font-family.description: Font family of the counter text.

theme-process-list-counter-font-size.description: Font size of the counter text.

theme-process-list-counter-gap-color.description: Color of gap between counter and connector. This should the the same as the background color behind the component.

theme-process-list-counter-gap-width.description: Size of gap between counter and connector.

theme-process-list-counter-text-color.description: Color of the number text inside the counter circle.

theme-process-list-connector-color.description: Color of the connector line between counter circles.

theme-process-list-connector-width.description: Width of the connector line between counter circles.

theme-process-list-font-family.description: Font family of the content text.

theme-process-list-font-size.description: Font size of the content text.

theme-process-list-heading-font-family.description: Font family of the heading text.

theme-process-list-heading-font-size.description: Font size of the heading text.

theme-input-background-color.description: Background color for radio and checkbox inputs.

theme-input-tile-border-radius.description: Tile border radius for rounded corners.

theme-sidenav-current-border-width.description: Width of the current section indicator.

theme-sidenav-font-family.description: Font family of the side navigation.

theme-site-alert-max-width.description: Maximum width of the site alert content.

theme-step-indicator-background-color.description: Background color of the component and the gaps around the counters.

theme-step-indicator-counter-gap.description: Gap between the counter and the segment.

theme-step-indicator-counter-border-widt.description: Size of the border around the pending steps.

$theme-step-indicator-font-family.description: Font family of the labels and counter numbers.

theme-step-indicator-heading-font-size.description: Font size of the heading on screens of $theme-step-indicator-min-width and larger.

theme-step-indicator-heading-font-size-s.description: Font size of the heading on screens smaller than $theme-step-indicator-min-width.

theme-step-indicator-min-width.description: Width at which the component displays large-width features.

theme-step-indicator-segment-color-pendi.description: Color of pending step segments. Use a grade of 40 more than $step-indicator-background-color.

theme-step-indicator-segment-color-compl.description: Color of complete step segments. Use a grade of at least 60.

theme-step-indicator-segment-color-curre.description: Color of the current step segments. Use a grade at least 20 less than $theme-step-indicator-segment-color-complete.

theme-step-indicator-segment-height.description: Height of the step segment. Note that the mobile segment height is always 1 unit.

theme-step-indicator-text-pending-color.description: The text color of pending steps. Use a gray grade of 60 more than the $step-indicator-background-color.

theme-summary-box-background-color.description: Background color of the Summary box.

theme-summary-box-border-color.description: Color the border around the Summary box.

theme-summary-box-border-width.description: Width of the border around the Summary box.

theme-summary-box-border-radius.description: Border radius of the summary box.

theme-summary-box-font-family.description: Font family of the content text.

theme-summary-box-link-color.description: Color of the links inside the content text. When set to “default”, links will get one of three values, based on contrast: $theme-link-color, $theme-link-reverse-color, or “ink”.

theme-summary-box-text-color.description: Color of the content text. When set to “default”, text will get one of two values, based on contrast: $theme-text-reverse-color or $theme-text-color.

theme-table-border-color.description: Defines a border color for table cells. A value of default uses either the default text or reverse text color depending on the site background color.

theme-table-header-background-color.description: Defines a background color for header cells.

theme-table-header-text-color.description: Defines a text color for header cells. A value of default uses either the default text or reverse text color depending on the header background color.

theme-table-sorted-background-color.description: Defines a background color for the cells of the sorted column.

theme-table-sorted-header-background-col.description: Defines a background color for the sorted column header.

theme-table-sorted-icon-color.description: Defines a fill color for the activated sort button in a sortable column header. A value of default uses either the default text or reverse text color depending on the sorted column header background color.

theme-table-sorted-stripe-background-col.description: Defines a background color for the alternating horizontal stripes applied to cells of the sorted column.

theme-table-stripe-background-color.description: Defines a background color for alternating horizontal stripes in the striped table variant.

theme-table-stripe-text-color.description: Defines a text color for alternating horizontal stripes in the striped table variant. A value of default uses either the default text or reverse text color depending on the stripe background color.

theme-table-text-color.description: Defines a text color for table cells. A value of default uses either the default text or reverse text color depending on the site background color.

theme-table-unsorted-icon-color.description: Defines a fill color for the unactivated sort button in a sortable column header.

theme-column-gap-mobile.description: Sets value of 'grid-gap' at mobile width.

theme-column-gap-desktop.description: Sets value of 'grid-gap' at desktop width.

theme-grid-container-max-width.description: Sets the max-width value of the .grid-container utility.

theme-site-margins-breakpoint.description: The breakpoint at which the site’s outer margin changes.

theme-site-margins-width.description: Site outer margin at non-mobile width (breakpoint defined by $theme-site-margins-breakpoint).

theme-site-margins-mobile-width.description: Site outer margin at mobile width (breakpoint defined by $theme-site-margins-breakpoint).

theme-respect-user-font-size.description: When true the root font size will be 100% and media queries use ems. When false, the root font size will be the px value specified in $theme-root-font-size and media queries will use px values.

theme-root-font-size.description: Only applies when $theme-respect-user-font-size is false. Set the root font size to the specified px value and use px values for media queries.

theme-global-paragraph-styles.description: Add basic styling to p elements.

theme-global-link-styles.description: Add basic styling to a elements.

theme-global-content-styles.description: Add basic styling to paragraph text, links, headings, lists, and tables.

theme-font-path.description: Path to the font files, relative to the compiled CSS.

theme-font-browser-compatibility.description: Output additional font formats (woff and ttf) to support IE11.

theme-font-type-cond.description: Project condensed font. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-type-icon.description: Project icon font. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-type-lang.description: Project language-specific font. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-type-mono.description: Project monospaced font. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-type-sans.description: Project sans-serif font. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-type-serif.description: Project serif font. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-role-ui.description: Assign font family used for interfaces and buttons from type-based family tokens.

theme-font-role-heading.description: Assign font family used for headings from type-based family tokens.

theme-font-role-body.description: Assign font family used for body text from type-based family tokens.

theme-font-role-code.description: Assign font family used for code from type-based family tokens.

theme-font-role-alt.description: Assign font family used for alternative type sections from type-based family tokens.

theme-type-scale-3xs.description: Use system size tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-type-scale-2xs.description: Use system size tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-type-scale-xs.description: Use system size tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-type-scale-sm.description: Use system size tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-type-scale-md.description: Use system size tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-type-scale-lg.description: Use system size tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-type-scale-xl.description: Use system size tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-type-scale-2xl.description: Use system size tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-type-scale-3xl.description: Use system size tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-font-weight-thin.description: Use system weight tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-font-weight-light.description: Use system weight tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-font-weight-normal.description: Use system weight tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-font-weight-medium.description: Use system weight tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-font-weight-semibold.description: Use system weight tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-font-weight-bold.description: Use system weight tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-font-weight-heavy.description: Use system weight tokens. Use false if unused.

theme-generate-all-weights.description: If USWDS is generating @font-face rules, generate all available weights regardless of the assignments above.

theme-font-cond-custom-stack.description: Custom font stack for condensed font. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-icon-custom-stack.description: Custom font stack for condensed font. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-lang-custom-stack.description: Custom font stack for condensed font. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-mono-custom-stack.description: Custom font stack for condensed font. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-sans-custom-stack.description: Custom font stack for condensed font. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-serif-custom-stack.description: Custom font stack for condensed font. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-[family]-custom-src.description: If you want USWDS to generate additional @font-face declarations, add your font data to the following variables as a map with these keys. You must include fonts saved as .woff2. Include .ttf and .woff fonts as well if $theme-font-browser-compatibility is set to true. Instructions can be found on the font-family page.

theme-font-cond-custom-src.description: See guidance above. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-icon-custom-src.description: See guidance above. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-lang-custom-src.description: See guidance above. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-mono-custom-src.description: See guidance above. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-sans-custom-src.description: See guidance above. Set to false if unused.

theme-font-serif-custom-src.description: See guidance above. Set to false if unused.

theme-style-body-element.description: Add explicit body styles to the body element.

theme-small-font-size.description: Used for the smallest text on a site.

theme-display-font-size.description: Used for the largest text on a site.

theme-prose-font-family.description: Font family used for body text in usa-prose. Use role-based family tokens.

$utilities-use-important.description: Output all utilities with !important. This can be necessary if you intend utilities to override existing styles.

$output-these-utilities.description: Include a list of all utility modules to output. Ex: ('align-items', 'border', 'margin', 'padding'). default includes all utilities.

$theme-utility-breakpoints.description: Set which mobile-first breakpoints are output for the utilities.

$global-color-palettes.description: Any palettes added to this list will output in the the following utilities: background-color, border-color, color, text-decoration-color.

$[utility-module]-settings.description: Control the output of a [utility-module] and its responsive and state variants.

$[utility-module]-palettes.description: Utilities output with the values set in the palettes list.

$[utility-module]-manual-values.description: Utilities output with the tokens and values set in the manual values map.
